attributes.action: Stop ignoring the REAL cause of congestion and major pollution in our country, the ridiculous number of HGV vehicles on our roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HGVs are by far the biggest polluters on our roads and definately the major cause of congestion. We need to re-invest in our rail network not roads and put the majority of freight back on the railways, problem solved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
